## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [group](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.group_property.md) |  | string | <p>An ID for the group of events this block is associated with.</p><p>Groups define events that should be treated as an single action from the user's perspective, and should be undone together.</p> |
|  [isBlank](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.isblank_property.md) | <code>abstract</code> | boolean | Whether or not the event was constructed without necessary parameters (to be populated by fromJson). |
|  [isUiEvent](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.isuievent_property.md) |  | boolean | Whether or not the event is a UI event. |
|  [recordUndo](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.recordundo_property.md) |  | boolean | Whether this event is undoable or not. |
|  [type](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.type_property.md) |  | string | Type of this event. |
|  [workspaceId?](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.workspaceid_property.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. |
